name: The man in the shadows
description:
This is my entry for SuNoFes (summer novel festival) whilst it is not a visual novel. It is still a narrative game, you can play it online and if that doesn't work you can download it but that requires an emulator i recommend this one (https://mgba.io/). this is a very early version and is no where near finished. that is why there may be things missing/ not working, also this demo is really quick but should show what its like.

note for the jam owners:

This is a horror game with a killer if there is anything that is going over the rules (no sex gore 18+) please comment and i will  get back to you

Have fun!
